tutorial.speak:
Let's set up plans in Chums. In the chums dashboard go to serving in the drop-down menu of dashboard
Click on add ministry
Give your ministry a name.
Click add
In this case, we named our ministry worship now click on worship
Now create a team, click on the teams icon in the top right corner
Click create team
Now give your team a name
And click add
Click on your team name to add members
Search your database by leaving the search field blank or typing in the name and add members to the team
Add as many members as you like
Now, navigate back to the Ministry called “Worship” and click on it
Click on create plan type
Give the plan type a descriptive name
In this case we called our plan type “Sunday Worship”. Click on that.
Begin by clicking create service plan
Give the plan a name, date and whether or not to include the service order. You also have the option to copy the form from a previous plan.
Click save
Click on the name of your plan
Click add position to your team assignments
Change the category name from "Band" to whatever category you like
Give the position a name and choose the number of people needed to fill that position
Choose a volunteer group to get the people from.
Add as many positions as needed, be sure to save.
Click to plus to add a time for the service
Make sure the date is correct
And choose the needed team
Be sure to save
Now, choose and notify the volunteers. You can write them a note to remind or encourage them.
Click on “person needed” to add a volunteer
Choose from the names listed on the right
Click notify volunteers. They will be notified through the B1 App or if they are not registered with B1 they will receive an e-mail.
